text: Hi, is it possible to make the modules non-editable from the editor's POV?

Yes <@U073HL56L9Z> I am not sure about the exact key within the meta.json, but if the module is available within Design Manager, then you should be able to toggle a switch there to set the module to be available in the editor or not.

At least something like this was possible a year ago. I hope I pointed you in the right direction.
Thanks <@U03ABR41A3H> i saw i can add a `locked` prop on the field components.
